    1. auditConfiguration(BuiltInAuditConfiguration)

Interface AuditConfiguration

public interface AuditConfiguration
This class represents the configuration required for an audit in the Burp Scanner Tool.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static AuditConfiguration
    auditConfiguration(BuiltInAuditConfiguration configuration)
    This method can be used to create a built-in audit configuration.

  • Method Details

    • auditConfiguration

      static AuditConfiguration auditConfiguration(BuiltInAuditConfiguration configuration)
      This method can be used to create a built-in audit configuration.
      Parameters:
      configuration - The BuiltInAuditConfiguration to use for the audit.
      Returns:
      a AuditConfiguration based on a built-in configuration
